name: Piti Srisongkram
short_description: I'm a variable when I'm learning but I'm constant when I'm listening to TRASH!
full_description: I have a passion to be a legendary of AI. I used to watch Iron-Man and I was impressed about how good of the technology is. Then I'm trying to learn and hope that Once! I can be the one who can make it be real!. Now, I'm on my way and I hope someone who saw this description you're not that bad and you can reach your goal!. I hope so.:]
